T02D1439:238b-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i chog / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1439:238b-4: nam mkha'i mdog can dri med rnal 'byor ma la rol //
T02D1439:238b-5: khyud rnams sprul pa bgye [?] nas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1439:238b-6: bsod nams ye shes tshogs yin te //
T02D1439:238b-7: tshogs la dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur //
T02D1439:238b-8: de phyir de yi cho ga ni //
T02D1439:238b-9: brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga dang //
T02D1439:238b-10: tshes bcu la ni de rab mchod //
T02D1439:238b-11: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig mchog / skyed mos tshal dang kun dga' dang //
T02D1439:238b-12: de bzhin rang gi khyim dang ni //
T02D1439:238b-13: gzhan yang dben pa'i khyim du bya //
T02D1439:238b-14: dang po tshogs kyi yo byad bsags te /
T02D1439:238b-15: de nas bdud rtsis chos 'byung bris la /
T02D1439:238b-16: de'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga dang thod par sbyar
T02D1439:238b-17: ba bzhag / de nas yon bdag gis phyag byas
T02D1439:238b-18: / me tog tshogs kyi slob dpon dang /
T02D1439:238b-19: rnal 'byor yon phul nas gsol ba gdab /
T02D1439:238b-20: de nas tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis //
T02D1439:238b-21: aom ma h'a ra shuddhe sarba dharm'a h'a ra shuddhoo& ham /
T02D1439:238b-22: zhes pa'i sngags mang bar bzlas /
T02D1439:238b-23: de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril
T02D1439:238b-24: bu 'dzin pas yum la 'khyud par snyoms par zhugs
T02D1439:238b-25: par bsam // de nas bdud rtsi sbyang bar byas //
T02D1439:238b-26: ye shes bdud rtsi phab la /
T02D1439:238b-27: aom aa mri ta h'um ci nus bzlas /
T02D1439:238b-29: de nas phyogs bcur sdigs mdzub kyi gtor bas byang sems dpal gyis bgegs bskrad /
T02D1439:238b-31: de nas aom a'a: h'um gis rdzas skyon med par bde bar brlab /
T02D1439:238b-32: de nas bskyed rim bsgom ste /
T02D1439:238b-33: bdun rnam dag gi skabs su mchod pa lnga dang bdud rtsi lngas mchod //
T02D1439:238b-34: ye shes 'khor lo la gcig / de nas dbang bskur yan chad rdzogs pa'i rjes la /
T02D1439:238b-35: rnal 'byor pa lnga'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa gcig mchod /
T02D1439:239a-0: @239a * // bdud rtsi dang zhal bsil gyi rjes la dbul //
T02D1439:239a-1: de nas lha bsdus la tshogs pas sbyang bar byas la //
T02D1439:239a-2: rnal 'byor pa rnams la me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D1439:239a-4: de nas nam mkha' khengs pa'i lha mos kyang //
T02D1439:239a-6: de nas skyes pa'i dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa
T02D1439:239a-7: chang gis bkang la tshig 'di brjod la drang bar
T02D1439:239a-8: bya / ltos shig dam pa'i chos bya ba //
T02D1439:239a-9: 'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin //
T02D1439:239a-10: bram ze khyi dad gdol pa gsum //
T02D1439:239a-11: rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza' //
T02D1439:239a-12: bde gshegs chos ni sdig med cing //
T02D1439:239a-13: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1439:239a-14: 'dod chags la sogs skyon dang bral //
T02D1439:239a-15: de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1439:239a-16: der ni bza' rnams gsol byas te //
T02D1439:239a-17: lhag ma snod du gzhag par bya //
T02D1439:239a-19: tshogs rol nas gcig gis mas yar lhag ma dang /
T02D1439:239a-20: da ci'i me tog bsdus la gtor mar bsam de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1439:239a-21: khru gang pa yi tshad du ni //
T02D1439:239a-22: dri ni bzang pos byug par bya //
T02D1439:239a-23: de phyir dkar po gru gsum yin //
T02D1439:239a-24: nya dang sha sogs gtor ma bzhag / me tog
T02D1439:239a-25: la sogs gtor mar bzhag / de mi dmigs par
T02D1439:239a-26: byas la / mos pas chos 'byung gru gsum bsams la /
T02D1439:239a-27: rtse mo thur na mo las aom las rnam snang /
T02D1439:239a-28: g-yon pa a'a: las snang ba mtha' yas /
T02D1439:239a-29: g-yas pa h'um las mi bskyod pa /
T02D1439:239a-30: nang du pam ljang gu las sna tshogs padma /
T02D1439:239a-31: de'i steng du sems can rnams yab yum dang /
T02D1439:239a-32: khro bo dang khyung du bsams la gtor ma btang /
T02D1439:239a-33: dza: h'um bam ho: sa mgron rang rgyud pa spyan drangs la bstim /
T02D1439:239a-36: de nas yang dag par mchod pa'i cho ga ma tshang ba dang lhag pa rnams /
T02D1439:239a-37: rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ge brgya pa gdon //
T02D1439:239a-38: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub la 'dod pa'i gsol ba gdab /
T02D1439:239a-39: de nas thal mo sbyar la smon lam gdab /
T02D1439:239a-40: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D1439:239a-41: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur pa'i //
T02D1439:239a-42: lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1439:239a-43: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02D1439:239b-0: ma grol ba rnams @239b grol bar shog / rnal 'byor gtsug lag dam tshig la //
T02D1439:239b-1: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / se gol lan gsum brda ba byas la //
T02D1439:239b-2: phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol //
T02D1439:239b-4: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
T02D1439:239b-5: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags nas kyang //
T02D1439:239b-6: 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin rgyal shog / tshogs kyi
T02D1439:239b-7: 'khor lo'i cho ga slob dpon rdo rje dril bu
